sentence.Network_en: Public buildings will go unrepaired, roads and railways unbuilt.
sentence.Network_cn: 公共建筑将陷入失修, 公路和铁路也得不到建设.

sentence.Network_en: It is not known how unrepaired DNA damage accelerates ageing or its relevance to natural ageing.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在还不清楚未修复DNA损伤是如何加速老化或其与自然老化关联性.

sentence.Network_en: Infants and young children with unrepaired tetralogy of Fallot are often blue ( cyanotic ).
sentence.Network_cn: 患有法洛四联症的婴幼儿经常表现为颜面、口唇青紫 ( 发绀 ).
